data.subject: Memory (뮤지컬 `캣츠`)
data.lyric:
Midnight, 
 not a sound from the pavement. 
 Has the moon lost her memory? 
 She is smiling alone.

data.subject: Killing Me Softly With His Song (영화 `어바웃 어 보이` / K팝스타 `이하이` 가창곡 / 원곡: 로베타 플랙)

data.subject: When A Man Loves A Woman (영화 `남자가 여자를 사랑할 때` / 원곡: 퍼시 슬레이지)
data.lyric:
When a man loves a woman,
 Can't keep his mind on nothin' else,
 He'd change the world for the good
